The wells of a polystyrene microtiter
Plate were activated by FNAB under UV light for 15 min at a wavelength of 365 nm as described earlier \(6).
In activated and untreated polystyrene microtiter plates,  analyte \(rabbit IgG, human IgE, Epicoccum nigrum ) was detected by immobilizing

Capture molecule \(anti-rabbit IgG, anti-human IgE, Epicoccum nigrum antigen) onto the activated and untreated polystyrene microtiter plates followed by blocking , binding  of analyte  and secondary antibody-conjugate.
The plates were washed by washing buffer after each step.
Color development was carried out by adding substrate dye buffer.
After 30 min, 50 µl of 2 M NaOH were added to stop the colour development.
Absorbance was recorded at 405 nm in an ELISA reader.
